mdx.rawBody:
Song: namma kAttula
Film: pattiyal
---
Notes: s r1 g2 m1 p d1 n2 S

O sinthAgi...
m p  p  mmp pp mmdd nddp

namma kAttula mazhai peiyudhu namba pAttula suthi yErudhu
p  d  n  S RS p d    n  S RS  p  d  n  S RG R G   RGR S

namba kOttaiyiL kodi Aduthu namba thOpaiyiL sugam kooduthu
p  d  n  S  RS  p d  nS RS  p  d  n  S  RG  R G   RG R S

kadal uppAla uruvACHu
n n   n S R  SS Sn nS

udaL thAppAla uruvACHu 
nn   n   S R  SS Sn nS

ada pazhasaiyum marandhACHu
Sn  n n  S  R   S S  Sn G

pudhu kadhavugaL thirandhACHu
G G   R G  R G   R  S  S  S

Stanza 1:
sathurangaTHil reNdu pattA kaNNeer vidAdhE
p S  S  S S    nS S  n  dp mp pm   g gm mp

peNNangaTHil ottikkittA kavalai padAdhE
p  S  S S    n S  n  dp m p pm  g gm mp

viLaiyAdu viLaiyAdu vidiya vidiya viLaiyAdu
p p  p dn d p  m m  m m m  p p p  p p  p p

koNdAdu koNdAdu kudhichu kudhichu koNdAdu
p  p dn dp m m  m m  m   p p  p   p  p p

oNNumariyA singam reNdu narambukkuLLE natpu uNdu
p p p R RS S  S   S  S  p p  p  R  RS S  S  S S

sErndhathadA garvam koNdu thEriyudhu pAr neruppu thuNdu
p   p  R  RS S  S   S  S  p  p p R   RSR G M  G  RS  S


Stanza 2: (notes similar to Stanza 1)
pAsa kEiru penn nidathiL vaichanE appa
padaiCHavanE pArkEilla kettu pAr appa
adagathE adagathE adakku adakku adagathE
valaiyadE pAniyadE yethumkum yethumkum asaiyadE
iravu vanthal yethu thokam illami vanthu Ala thukum
kaRathadaiyiL irru pookum nakkadaiyiL konjam verkkum
